one_reviews_text: A good VR poker game. It compares favorably to other VR poker though not as well known. They have added some cool rooms lately.

Pointless now. The bots just kill you and nobody is on any more
Bugs were never fixed

So I tried this game with Oculus head gear then with RIFT and just then again for a 2nd try with RIFT ... This is not only the worst poker game but the worst game I have ever tried ... I lost all my chips trying to use the controls then tried to put in requested email to get more chips - also a complete failure ... AGAIN I un-install this bad experience ....

review_title: One of the best social VR experiences
one_reviews_text: A great poker game with some nice VR touches, as you can see from the video above. There is a great community of players. Also, the Devs listen to feedback and are actively looking to improve an already fun game.

The PC level graphics and advanced player interaction are it's high points, also you can have up to 8 players per table (instead of only 6)... But when it comes to respecting poker rules on minimum raises or folding in turn, or bothering to perform a rollback when they mess up big time with their latest patch (which they do)... well that's where you're better off looking for a VR poker platform with worse graphics and less interaction, but proper poker mechanics and game management.
as in junlk

I've been playing Metatable Poker since I got my Oculus Rift in March of this year and it is by far my favorite game and the only game I play multiple times per week.  The poker play is real and it does not cost anything unless you choose to buy chips.  Most players will help new players starting out to build their bank rolls, which leads me to the best aspect of the game...the social aspect.  As a regular player, I have become friends with several people in the game and look forward to playing with them when I log in.  It's amazing that we all come from different parts of the world, yet we feel like we're sitting in the same room together.  It's a fun social game.  I highly recommend to poker players of all skill levels.  The developers are very active in communicating with the players and getting feedback for improvements.  I've seen this game improve in a few short months and I can't wait to see what's next.  Love this game!

review_title: Lets hope a better poker game arrives...
one_reviews_text:
You only get a few thousand free chips every 24hrs, farming the AI bots is not hard so it boosts your cash, most players only play in the higher tables, and theres not that many of them online, most are usa timezone, therefore at the lower tables is not so easy to get a decent game going...

the system for picking up chips aint perfect and glithces out a few times and its not a exact science either so everyone just flings a stack into the centre.

its alright the game looks good enough, its fun with a freindly community all be it extrememly tiny and its worth playing, speaking of cash to buy chips they want a $100 for 1.5million on pokerstars that would cost me around $6 

not happening !!! 
(not forgetting PS free chips = every hour)

as the title says lets hope a few rivals come along, because whilst decent its aint all that great either...

I don't know why I end up play this game for the whole day long, lol :)
They give 5k every 12 hours for broke players, rift+gear+go can play together, the first winner of the first tournament got 3millions reward, promising more tournaments in the future, and many cool things that you should check them out

Very realistic!!! Reminds me of the good old days when I used to play poker late nights with my buddies.  I like being able to throw my chips and cards along with other items I can purchase with chips.  I play this game more than any other game.  

The only thing I would change is giving people who lose all their money more than $1000 after 24 hours.  Maybe even giving it to them within 12 hours instead or even better one thousand every hour so they can build back up to the starting amount of ten thousand.  I don't mind giving people who are about to lose all their money free handout, so they can continue playing uninterupted, but I would rather not if at all possible.
Nice Experience

review_title: best poker game ive played, awesome game
one_reviews_text:
GAME IS DEVOLOPED VERY WELL, YOU CAN PLAY AND BUILD UP.
GAME PLAY IS EXELLENT, OUT OF ALL THE GAMES I PLAY ON OCULUS I PLAY THIS THE MOST. GAME CAN ALWAYS BE UPATED TO CORRECT BUGS, BUT DEVOLPERS ARE AWLAYS FIXING THEM. AND GET INVOLVED TO MAKE SURE THEY ARE CORRECTED
Has great potential. But it seems i get no matchmaking. No human players for me. if i do something wrong please respond.
Worth a try once or twice, very few seem to be online....
Good
first couple tries the game didn't work and I had to recalibrate my oculus 2 times for it to fix but after that painful experience I actually enjoy the game a lot! Good fun with friends too!!!
Nice
Play with bots, play with friends, or play with strangers, make new friends or make enemies by winning all their chips.  Still a little buggy but worth it.

It's great when you get into a table with a bunch of witty BS'ers and have at eachothers chip stacks ~ Fun handing them a pile of poo to eat after a bad hand and also fun to throw hats upon thine enemy's heads ~ just lots of fun ` worth playing for sure!

 For those complaining about wanting more free chips in the free game to start with, umm, maybe don't go all in with a 7 3 off suit hoping to scare someone off and actually build your stack? These devs cant be expected to work to make this game for free for you and never charge a cent. You get free chips daily and start with some...just play poker and not bingo, and you should do alright ^.~

This is the game I'm trying to use to get my friends back into VR. Really well done concept and executed well. Not a huge player base yet, but I haven't had a problem finding real people to play with yet. Love that they use your Oculus avatar for this. I haven't had to spend real money (yet), either.
Clearly logged in but the app wont allow me to start it.

Really enjoyable game, if you like poker, you'll love this.

Egon. . .

review_title: No way to get more chips except to buy
one_reviews_text:
There is no way to attain more chips except through microtranactions which is ridiculous. 
You start with 10,000, and there are maybe one or two other players playing at a time. Usually one or more of said players will have 1,000,000+ chips and just bully you out of the game. Good concept but poor and greedy implementation. One star. Wait for a better No Limit Hold 'Em game.
review_feedback: We are sorry you had a bad experience. All new users can gain 5k additional chips by entering their email address. In addition, you will be given up to 1k chips per day to play with for returning to the game. Hope you give us another try!

one_reviews_text: This still has some kinks to be fleshed out in it but it's a great poker platform. I've had a few bugs but the developers have always been quick to respond and take care of things. The only downside is we need more of a player base. If you enjoy texas hold 'em then you should check it out. Those complaining about only being able to buy chips after busting out are generally the all-in-donkeys who it's nice not to have to be quite honest. They have since added a daily bonus though that you can get 1000 chips free a day. The only reason I give it a 4 instean of 5 is because there are still some bugs to be worked out but the devs seem to be working on them.

This is definately one of those games with great potential. It has a few glitches, and is a working progress, but the developers are quick to address the issues and fix them. They are also eager to take feedback and suggestions to make it better. If you have a problem with the game, the developers will make sure you are taken care of. 4 of 5 stars due to some bug issues, but 5 star for customer service. I love playing this game, and the interactions between players is really fun.
I can't wait until more players figure out that it's here.

It's like poker where the house takes 100% of the money. No way to gain or earn coins. You have to buy them after you go through the initial money they give you so the currency is actually monetized; however, you can not cash out the chips for money, ergo the house takes 100%. Only a couple people at tables. I'm pretty sure some of the names are fake, may be bots?

Could be a good start, but I got disconnected several times in the middle of a game, and I've lost several chips from this. Posted a feedback about it, but didn't get any answer. This needs a fix or an explanation. Also, avatar and interaction are very basic. Keep up the good work, it can be a 5 star with some rework.
review_feedback: Dear sir/madam, thank you for your feedback. We did give you a chip credit, however we don't have your email address and thus had no way to respond to your feedback and let you know. Please feel free to use the in game feedback or visit our website at metatable.co and use the form there to give us your email address. Our game does depend on a good and continuous internet connection and there are unfortunately several potential points of failure between our servers in America and where you are located in Europe, so a temporary outage at any place along the route may cause this sort of problem. In these rare cases we do stand ready to credit chips as soon as possible but don't always have a way to contact players to let them know. Most of our players have not seen the problems you are seeing but we will look for ways to improve the experience under those conditions and be certain we are doing everything we can. Please come back and try us again.

one_reviews_text: 4 not 5 because it needs several tweeks then some big time updates. That being said, it's hands down the best VR online poker expieriance I've found. GET IT, take a seat say high and try to take my chips. If you like online poker you need this one. IT'S FREE.

Hands down one of the best games I've played. If you like texas hold um, you can't go wrong. I've only been using the oculus for a week or 2 but I can assure you I'll be playing this a lot. ---Pntydropper
Best VR Poker game to date... and if u get any problems the developers are quick to help. Highly recomended.
